title: Champion Men's Powerblend Fleece Hoodie Sweatshirt with Script Logo (Regular and Big & Tall)
description: THE FIT - Standard-fit men's hoodie that hits at the hip.
THE FEEL - Crafted with a soft, midweight 9 oz. fleece with a brushed interior for warmth without extra bulk.
THE LOOK - This men's hoodie has a ribbed cuff and hem that lends a classic look while the soft, double-layered hood keeps you warm and comfortable. Cool and classic script graphic spans the chest.
LOW PILL, LOW SHRINK - High-quality, cotton blend fabrication helps to reduce pilling and shrinkage, so this piece can be a longtime favorite.
THE POWERBLEND COLLECTION - A powerhouse fabric blend that’s made for the daily with a stay-true fit and comfort that never quits.
Note: C logo patch color may vary from image.
Champion Men'S Hoodie, Powerblend, Fleece Men'S Hoodie, Comfortable Men'S Sweatshirt, Script Logo (Reg. Or Big & Tall)
